title: Make God a Part Of Your Everyday Life | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Make God a Part Of Your Everyday Life | Joel Osteen
description:
When you make God a part of your everyday life, He will crown your efforts with success. Trust Him in the big things and the small things. He wants to help you go further than you ever could on your own.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
